review: Amazon Fire TV is good, but lacks streaming channels compared to Roku.  Fire TV mirroring work OK, but with the HDX Kindle tablet if your cable provider is Comcast you will be unable to download the Comcast application to stream channels from your tablet and mirror on your TV.  This was a big reason we choose Fire TV, to mirror our Comcast channels, but as we have learned it is not possible to load the Xfinity Comcast app on the HDX Kindle, therefore no mirroring Comcast channels.  Google Play Store is the only place to download Xfinity and Google Play does not support Kindle's.  In my opinion Roku has Fire TV beat at this time with Mirroring and the number of news, sports and entertainment channels.  We will be going with Roku for now.  Fire TV may be a little faster than Roku with the quad core processor.
